items.content_html: A lightweight data export utility for MudBlazor DataGrid in .NET, enabling simple and efficient generation of .xlsx, .csv, and .json files directly from grid data. Built with OpenXML and JavaScript interop for seamless browser-based file downloads.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.
